items.sentence: I didn\'t tell Tom about it because I didn\'t want to ruin his day.
Tom could tell by Mary\'s accent that she wasn\'t a native speaker.
Tom doesn\'t know if Mary will go to the mountains or to the beach.
I\'m pretty sure that Tom doesn\'t know what you\'re talking about.
Tom doesn\'t have a cat. However, Tom does have a dog, doesn\'t he?
